medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started yesterday night around the umbilicus as a dull ache, associated with nausea and vomiting. The pain localized to the right lower quadrant, with persistent nausea and vomiting. The patient last ate around 3am and has had anorexia since. She currently reports continued pain with nausea and chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Postpartum depression, treated H. pylori, anxiety, non-specific elevated LFTs.
